name: RPG Test
description:
RPG TEST - This is a WIP game, it should be considered as pre-alpha.

Controls and help are now within the game!

Contact mail: pgonarg@gmail.com

Changelog:

0.02a - Implemented simple UI, inventory (loading items from disk, no writing yet).

0.02a - Fixed character movement using pathfinding (baked navmesh) with navmesh agent.

0.01a - Implemented character movement, simple dialogue
